Title: Project Hail Mary
Author: Andy Weir
Summary: Ryland Grace is the sole survivor on a desperate, last-chance mission—and if he fails, humanity and the earth itself will perish.

Title: The Midnight Library
Author: Matt Haig
Summary: Nora Seed finds herself in a strange library where each book represents a different version of her life.

Title: Atomic Habits
Author: James Clear
Summary: No matter your goals, Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving--every day.

Title: Dune
Author: Frank Herbert
Summary: When his family takes control of the dangerous desert planet Arrakis, Paul Atreides becomes entangled in political betrayal.

Title: The Silent Patient
Author: Alex Michaelides
Summary: A criminal psychotherapist becomes obsessed with uncovering the truth behind a woman who murdered her husband.

Title: Pride and Prejudice
Author: Jane Austen
Summary: Elizabeth Bennet navigates family pressure, social expectations, and her own prejudices as she clashes with Mr. Darcy.

Title: Educated
Author: Tara Westover
Summary: Born to survivalists in the mountains of Idaho, Tara Westover was seventeen the first time she set foot in a classroom.

Title: Circe
Author: Madeline Miller
Summary: In the house of Helios, god of the sun and mightiest of the Titans, a daughter is born. But Circe is a strange child.

Author: George Orwell
Summary: In a society ruled by constant surveillance and manipulated truth, a man quietly rebels against an authoritarian regime.

Title: The Great Gatsby
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Summary: Through the eyes of Nick Carraway, the story explores obsession, illusion, and moral decay among the wealthy elite.

Title: Dark Matter
Author: Blake Crouch
Summary: Jason Dessen is walking home through the chilly Chicago streets one night when his reality shatters.

Title: Becoming
Author: Michelle Obama
Summary: In a life filled with meaning and accomplishment, Michelle Obama has emerged as one of the most iconic women of our era.

Title: The Name of the Wind
Author: Patrick Rothfuss
Summary: Told in Kvothe's own voice, this is the tale of the magically gifted young man who grows to be a notorious wizard.

Title: Gone Girl
Author: Gillian Flynn
Summary: When a woman disappears under suspicious circumstances, the investigation exposes dark secrets.

Title: The Alchemist
Author: Paulo Coelho
Summary: A young shepherd sets out on a journey that teaches him about listening to his heart.

Title: Red, White & Royal Blue
Author: Casey McQuiston
Summary: First Son Alex Claremont-Diaz is the closest thing to a prince this side of the Atlantic.

Title: Sapiens
Author: Yuval Noah Harari
Summary: 100,000 years ago, at least six human species inhabited the earth. Today there is just one. Us.

Title: A Court of Thorns and Roses
Author: Sarah J. Maas
Summary: Feyre's survival rests upon her ability to hunt and kill – the forest where she lives is a cold, bleak place.

Title: Steve Jobs
Author: Walter Isaacson
Summary: Based on more than forty interviews with Jobs conducted over two years.

Title: It Ends with Us
Author: Colleen Hoover
Summary: Lily hasn’t always had it easy, but that’s never stopped her from working hard for the life she wants.

Title: The Quantum Gardener
Author: Anya Sharma
Summary: A humble gardener on a space station discovers a new species that communicates through shared dreams.

Title: Echoes of the Forgotten
Author: Liam O'Connell
Summary: A young bard finds a cursed lute that allows him to hear the final memories of the dead.

Title: Midnight Protocol
Author: Kaito Tanaka
Summary: A disgraced former cyber-security expert is forced back into the shadowy world of hacking.

Title: The Scent of Rain
Author: Elena Rodriguez
Summary: Two rival perfumers in Paris collaborate on a signature scent for a royal wedding.

Title: Zero Point
Author: Dr. Aris Thorne
Summary: A groundbreaking and accessible exploration of zero-point energy.

Title: The Glass Constellation
Author: Seraphina Vane
Summary: In a city built entirely of magically reinforced glass, a young glazier's apprentice discovers a fracture.

Title: Binary Soul
Author: Marcus J. Lee
Summary: In a future where human consciousness can be uploaded to the cloud, a detective investigates digital murder.

Title: The Last Ember
Author: Nia Imani
Summary: In a world plunged into eternal winter, a young woman discovers she possesses the last spark of fire.

Title: Dead Air
Author: Sarah Jenkins
Summary: A late-night radio host starts receiving calls from a listener who claims to be reporting murders.

Title: Orbiting You
Author: Leo Kim
Summary: An astrophysicist and a botanist find love on a remote space station.

Title: Sapiens 2.0
Author: Yuval Noah Harari (AI)
Summary: A speculative look at the next stage of human evolution and biotechnology.

Title: The Silent Note
Author: Emily Chen
Summary: A deaf musician witnesses a murder but cannot identify the killer by sound.

Title: Clockwork Heart
Author: Arthur Pendelton
Summary: In a steampunk version of Victorian London, an automaton develops genuine human emotions.

Title: Project Chimera
Author: Dr. Evelyn Reed
Summary: A geneticist suspects her super-soldier subjects are rapidly evolving beings with their own agenda.

Title: Coffee & Cigarettes
Author: Jack Kerouac (AI)
Summary: A raw narrative of disillusioned artists in 1950s New York City.

Title: The Memory Market
Author: Sofia Petrova
Summary: In a future where memories can be bought and sold, a 'memory thief' uncovers a conspiracy.

Title: Crimson Sails
Author: Captain Elias Thorne
Summary: A high-seas adventure in a world of floating islands and sky-pirates.

Title: The Algorithm of Love
Author: Chloe Davis
Summary: A cynical app developer creates a dating algorithm that matches her with her complete opposite.

Title: Deep Fake Truth
Author: Mark Zuckerberg (AI)
Summary: An exploration of the world of deepfakes, synthetic media, and the future of truth.

Title: The Forgotten Garden
Author: Isabella Rossi
Summary: A woman inherits an abandoned estate in Italy and uncovers family secrets.

Title: The Three-Body Problem
Author: Liu Cixin
Summary: A secret military experiment makes contact with an alien civilization.

Title: Recursion
Author: Blake Crouch
Summary: A mysterious technology that allows people to relive memories begins to fracture reality.

Title: Neuromancer
Author: William Gibson
Summary: A washed-up hacker is hired for one last dangerous job.

Title: Snow Crash
Author: Neal Stephenson
Summary: In a hyper-commercialized future, a pizza-delivering hacker uncovers a virtual virus.

Title: The Way of Kings
Author: Brandon Sanderson
Summary: On a war-torn world, several broken individuals struggle with survival.

Title: Mistborn: The Final Empire
Author: Brandon Sanderson
Summary: In a world ruled by an immortal tyrant, a group of rebels plans an impossible heist.

Title: The Lies of Locke Lamora
Author: Scott Lynch
Summary: A master thief leads an elite group of con artists through elaborate schemes.

Title: The Hobbit
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien
Summary: A quiet hobbit is drawn into an unexpected adventure filled with dragons.

Title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Author: Stieg Larsson
Summary: A journalist and a brilliant hacker investigate a decades-old disappearance.

Title: Shutter Island
Author: Dennis Lehane
Summary: Two U.S. marshals investigate a disappearance at a remote psychiatric facility.

Title: Before I Go to Sleep
Author: S.J. Watson
Summary: A woman with severe memory loss wakes up each day with no recollection of her past.

Title: Me Before You
Author: Jojo Moyes
Summary: A young woman takes a job caring for a man with a disability.

Title: The Hating Game
Author: Sally Thorne
Summary: Two office coworkers locked in a constant battle of passive-aggressive games.

Title: Normal People
Author: Sally Rooney
Summary: An intimate exploration of connection and miscommunication.

Title: Homo Deus
Author: Yuval Noah Harari
Summary: An examination of how technological and scientific advances may shape future goals.

Title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
Author: Daniel Kahneman
Summary: A deep dive into how humans think, explaining mental shortcuts and biases.

Title: The Power of Habit
Author: Charles Duhigg
Summary: An exploration of how habits form and how understanding them leads to change.
